title: CSU | Creative Summoners Union | Let's make some awesome stuff!
body:
So, I've started up a small little place for creators to get together, to share and discuss, to learn and collaborate. And, we're open to everyone now!

If you're a:
* Writer
* Musician
* Video Editor
* Cosplayer
* Artist

This group is for you!

We're currently based on Discord at https://discord.gg/UpepN8N

For now, it's just starting up, and I want to get people in and involved. I do have plans, but it relies on people getting involved. So, let's do it!
